description: Normal execution with typical review data

scraped_reviews.review_title: Great place to work with excellent benefits
scraped_reviews.review_text: I've been working at Microsoft for 2 years and really enjoy the collaborative culture. The benefits are excellent, including comprehensive health insurance and generous parental leave. Management is generally supportive and provides clear direction on projects. The only downside is that sometimes the bureaucracy can slow down innovation, but overall it's a great place to grow your career.
scraped_reviews.pros: Excellent benefits, supportive management, collaborative culture

scraped_reviews.review_title: Good work-life balance but limited growth
scraped_reviews.review_text: Microsoft offers decent work-life balance and the pay is competitive. However, I've found it challenging to get promoted and the learning opportunities are somewhat limited in my division. The company culture is professional but can feel impersonal at times. HR is responsive when you need help.
scraped_reviews.pros: Good work-life balance, competitive pay, responsive HR
